definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: LXX )Iwakeim (´[[י]] raiseth up; cf. [[אֶלְיׇקִים]] & reff.; also [[יׇקִים]], [[יְקַמְיׇה]]—

´[[יְהוֹ]] one of the last kings of Judah, son of Josiah 2Ki 23:34, 2Ki 23:35, 2Ki 23:36, 2Ki 24:1, 2Ki 24:5, 2Ki 24:6, 2Ki 24:19, 1Ch 3:15, 1Ch 3:16, 2Ch 36:4, 2Ch 36:5, 2Ch 36:8, Je 1:3, Je 22:18, Je 22:24, Je 24:1+ 19 t. Je, Da 1:1, Da 1:2; name changed fr. orig. [[אֶלְיׇקִים]] 2Ki 23:34 = 2Ch 36:4. †
[[יוֹיׇקִים]] priest, son of Jeshua Ne 12:10, Ne 12:10, Ne 12:12, Ne 12:26. †
